data.prayer: Over 96.37 percent of the people of Banjul are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Banjul, Gambia

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Banjul who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Banjul to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 314 believers in Banjul to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 34,286 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Banjul
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Banjul, Banjul, Gambia.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 33,343, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Banjul, Gambia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Banjul, Gambia has a population of 34,600.

We estimate Banjul has 314 people who might know Jesus, 943 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 33,343 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 110 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Banjul.
